column4: i can't seem to find an ubuntu package for bamboo-dht (.org) anywhere in the various sources i have here.
does anyone else know if a package exists?
what's the proper way to request an ubuntu package, knowing that it may be ignored at will?
you build them. you don't ask people to build them. :)
that viewpoint excludes participation in package selection by all who are unable to create packages, which seems sort of not the best
but i only work on things that interest me :)
point is that this damn linux relies on good faith and hobbies.
so why can't you just compile from source?
and they have a mailing list.
